element.name: Brand of the Dead Man's Wager

p.em: "The ink never dries on a contract with the Proprietor. It just burns deeper."

description.p: This brand appears on your skin as a searing mark of your debt to the Trickster.

ul.li: Active Phase (Hours 1-8): You gain +2 AC. The sun glows, but one ray extinguishes every hour.
Burden Phase (Hours 9-20): The sun is dark. You lose the AC bonus. You cannot Long Rest until the 20th hour passes.

description.p: During the Burden Phase, roll a d20 every hour. On a 1, the Dealer collects interest. Roll a d8 on the Corruption Table.

sheet.description: +2 AC for 8 hours. Afterwards, AC bonus is lost. Each hour past 8, roll a d20; on a 1, trigger a Corruption effect.

p.em: "It's not gambling if you know you're going to win."

description.p: You have mastered the art of throwing cards with deadly precision.

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You gain proficiency with playing cards. If you are already proficient, add double proficiency.
Treat playing cards as simple ranged weapons (finesse, thrown 30/60). Hit: 1d6 slashing. If already proficient as weapons, 1d8.
Bonus action: Throw an extra card when you attack with one.

sheet.description: Cards are 1d6 weapons (30/60). If already proficient, 1d8. Bonus action: Throw extra card.

p.em: "The grave can wait. I have one last hand to play."

ul.li: Increase your Constitution or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.
You have advantage on death saving throws.

sheet.description: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead. Advantage on Death Saves.

p.em: "A 20 is a crit. A 1 is a miss. But an Ace in the Hole? That's whatever I say it is."

description.p: You have learned to keep a card up your sleeve.

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Pocket Destiny: When you finish a long rest, roll a d20 and record it. This is your Hole Card.
Play the Ace: Replace an attack, check, or save with your Hole Card (declare before rolling).
The Bluff: Reaction to replace an incoming attack roll against you with your Hole Card.

sheet.description: Long Rest: Roll d20 (Hole Card). Use to replace your own roll or Reaction to replace enemy attack roll against you.

p.em: "I don't like those numbers. Change them."

description.p: You refuse to accept a poor performance from fate.

ul.li: Increase your Constitution or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
The Ante: When you roll damage, you can reroll any number of dice. You take 1 necrotic damage per die rerolled (unpreventable).
The Result: You must use the new rolls.
Jackpot: If a rerolled die shows its max value, gain Temp HP equal to total max-value dice + Con Mod.

sheet.description: Reroll damage dice at cost of 1 necrotic/die. If die rolls max, gain Temp HP (Total Max Dice + {{constitution:modifier}}).

description.p: When death comes knocking, you propose a coin toss.

ul.li: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
The Gamble: Reaction when taking damage to make a DC 13 Flat Check (d20 only).
Success (13+): Reduce damage by 2d12 + Con Mod.
Failure (1-12): Damage is not reduced, reaction lost.
Cooldown: Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest.

sheet.description: Take damage: Make DC 13 Flat Check. Success: Reduce damage by 2d12 + {{constitution:modifier}}. Failure: No reduction.
